file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-44-03-04 - CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CHARGING VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the Emergency/Parking Brake system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CHARGING VALVE OF THE HYDRAULIC ALL 32-44-03-000-801-A ACCUMULATOR OF THE EMERGENCY/ PARKING BRAKE SYSTEM - REMOVAL CHARGING VALVE OF THE HYDRAULIC ACCUMULATOR OF THE EMERGENCY/ ALL 32-44-03-400-801-A PARKING BRAKE SYSTEM - INSTALLA- TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-44-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-44-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CHARGING VALVE OF THE HYDRAULIC ACCUMULATOR OF THE EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE SYSTEM - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the Emergency/Parking Brake system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC ACCUMULATOR EMERGENCY/PARK- AMM TASK 32-44-02-910-801-A/200 ING BRAKE - RELEASE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 193 193JR Hydraulic compartment 2 D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Hydraulic compartment 2 I. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ELEC PUMP 2 circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open access panel 193JR of hydraulic compartment 2 (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) Fully release the pressure from the fluid chamber of the emergency/parking brake system hydraulic accumulator ( AMM TASK 32-44-02-910-801-A/200 ). (4) Slowly open the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator to let all pressure in it go out. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-44-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the lockwire (6). (2) Disconnect the nut (5). (3) Remove the bolts (1), the washer (2) and the lock washer (8). (4) Remove the charging valve (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-44-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Charging Valve of the Hydraulic Accumulator of the Emergency/Parking Brake System - Removal/ Installation Figure 401 EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE HYDRAULIC ACCUMULATOR B A ZONE 193 DET. A ACCESS PANEL 193JR 2 5. NUT 1 4. NUT 1 4. NUT 3. CHARGING VALVE BRACKET (REF.) 2. WASHER 6. LOCKWIRE 7. VALVE 1. BOLT 3 8. LOCK WASHER 1 TORQUE: 2.8 - 3.4 N.m (25 - 30 lb.in) 2 TORQUE: 10.7 - 11.9 N.m (95 - 105 lb.in) DET. B 3 TORQUE: 5.6 - 7.9 N.m (50 - 70 lb.in) EM145AMM320111D.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-44-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-44-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CHARGING VALVE OF THE HYDRAULIC ACCUMULATOR OF THE EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE SYSTEM - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the charging valve of the hydraulic accumulator of the emergency/parking brake system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-801-A/200 HTS EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE ACCUMULATOR - AMM TASK 32-44-02-600-801-A/300 CHARGE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 193 193JR Hydraulic compartment 2 D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) 1 (If MS28775-015 O-ring neces- sary) MIL-G-46886 Molykote DC33 Light Grease AR MS20995C32 Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Hydraulic compartment 2 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-44-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the charging valve (3) in the bracket (REF.). (2) Attach one of the bolts (1) with the washer (2) in the nut (4) and attach the other bolt (1) with the lock washer (8) in the other nut (4). Apply a torque of 2.8 to 3.4 N.m (25 to 30 lb.in) to the two bolts (1). (3) Connect the nut (5) in the charging valve (3). Apply a torque of 10.7 to 11.9 N.m (95 to 105 lb.in). (4) Install the lockwire (6) in the lock washer (8) and in the charging valve (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Pressurize the nitrogen chamber of the hydraulic accumulator ( AMM TASK 32-44-02-600-801-A/300). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the ELEC PUMP 2 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (3) Pressurize hydraulic system 2 ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-801-A/200). (4) Do a check on the charging valve for leaks. (5) Close access panel 193JR of hydraulic compartment 2 (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-44-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
